Detailed Description

ITaskManager is an interface class for linking ISystemTasks to a TaskManager

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef void( * ITaskManager::JobFunction)(void *)

This type defines the callback used for generic jobs by the ITaskManager.

typedef u32( * ITaskManager::JobCompletionFunction)(void *)

Returns:
the number of jobs issued by this function

This type defines the callback used for generic job completions by the ITaskManager.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ITaskManager::JobCountInstructionHints

See also:
ITaskManager::GetRecommendedJobCount

This type provides hints to the GetRecommendedJobCount method on the type of work about to be submitted to the ITaskManager.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void ITaskManager::NonStandardPerThreadCallback ( JobFunction  pfnCallback,
void *  pData 
) [pure virtual]

This method triggers a synchronized callback to be called once by each thread used by the ITaskManager. This method which should only be called during initialization and shutdown of the ITaskManager. This method waits until all callbacks have executed.

Parameters:
pfnCallback the function callback to execute
pData a pointer to data that is passed to the callback

virtual u32 ITaskManager::GetRecommendedJobCount ( JobCountInstructionHints  Hints = None  )  [pure virtual]

Call this method to determine the ideal number of tasks to submit to the ITaskManager for maximum performance.

Parameters:
Hints guidance on the type of work done in the jobs about to be submitted
Returns:
the number of jobs which is optimal for the type of work specified by Hints

virtual void ITaskManager::SetNumberOfThreads ( u32  uNumberOfThreads  )  [pure virtual]

Parameters:
uNumberOfThreads the limit of the number of threads to use

This method constrains the number of threads used by the ITaskManager.
